articles.title: Call for dementia risk to be included in UK air pollution policies - The Guardian
articles.description: Report urges actions to reduce exposure to pollution and for brain health to be in net zero strategies
articles.content:
A wealth of research shows that air pollution is harming our brain health, including our mental health and our risk of dementia. A new report has outlined what we should do next.

articles.title: Amputees could feel warmth of human touch with new bionic technology - Reuters
articles.description: Fabrizio Fidati, who lost his right hand in an accident 25 years ago, had not experienced the sensation of temperature in his missing digits until trials for a bionic technology unlocked the cool of iced water and heat of a stove burner for him.
